survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Wellness Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with digital wellness tools provided by the company, focusing on usability, effectiveness, and overall impact on well-being.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the digital wellness tools provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. This question helps gauge adoption rates.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the digital wellness tools provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which digital wellness tools do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes. This helps identify popular tools.

script.question_text: Which digital wellness tools do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital wellness tools provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital wellness tools provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital wellness tools provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital wellness tools provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: Have the digital wellness tools positively impacted your overall well-being?
answer_options: No, they have had a negative impact
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to measure perceived impact.

script.question_text: Have the digital wellness tools positively impacted your overall well-being?
answer_options: No, they have had a negative impact
